task.title: How to Subtract Numbers?
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the subtraction feature of JPS Calculator App.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully subtract numbers, you must know what is subtraction.

step.stepresult: The result from the subtraction will be displayed.

example.p: When you want to subtract 2 from 3, the equation will look like 3-2=1. First enter 3, then minus (-), later press 2, now press equal (=).
The result 1 will appear on the screen.
